context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content provides clear instructions on how to report a missed collection, specifically by using the provided link. The content also clarifies that the bin should be out for collection by 6:00am and notes that you should wait until 4:00pm on your collection day before reporting.
Reason.next_actions: Click the provided link to report the missed collection, ensuring the bin is put out before the 6:00am collection time.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content effectively addresses the need of a council resident who has forgotten to put their bin out and wants it collected. It provides clear instructions and a link on how to report the missed collection, but lacks information on what to do if you need help or have additional questions.
